column5: Finally got to bottling the annual batch of elderberry brandy.   Now to find somewhere to hide it when the offspring visit. They inhale the stuff.
It will be safe here bruce,,,,,unless the beer store closes up shop.LMAO
Nice stash Bruce   Your secret is safe with me
I'm closer than either of them Bruce you can hide it in Burlington I have a nice cool spot...

It just would not be Christmas without a good mixture of traditional brandies. To go with the elderberry I have a bottle of Napoleon and a bottle of Lingonberry.  Just right for keeping the chill off.

Your stash always looks good Bruce   Thx for reminding me about  festive season traditions. I will have to get out for our  annual bottle of dark rum  and a couple of cartons of eggnog...oh and I better check the spice rack for nutmeg too
Had my first glass of nog this evening as a wee reward.  Hopefully we get to share a nip or 2 from the recipe out on the ice this winter
Sounds like a plan my friend
